UNLOAD_NETWORK_TIP: Loading phone data. Do you want to wait?
UPGRADE_BTN_TEXT: Get the latest version on Google Play

EXTENSION_SIGN_OUT.title: Confirm Sign Out
EXTENSION_SIGN_OUT.content: Signing out of the Chrome Extension will sign you out of SnapPea Web too.

CHECK_SAME_NETWORK: Make sure your computer is on the Wi-Fi network
DISCONNECT_FACEBOOK_INFO: Disconnect your Facebook you will no longer be able to share your photos on Facebook.
FACEBOOK_DISCONNECT_TIP: Connect to Facebook to easily share photos with your friends.

CONNECT_NEW_PHONE_TIPS.STEP1: 1. Install SnapPea on your phone from Google Play
CONNECT_NEW_PHONE_TIPS.STEP2: 2. Open SnapPea and sign in with $$$$
CONNECT_NEW_PHONE_TIPS.STEP3: After you finish, your phone will appear here.
